addtocompare_hover_color.label: Add to Compare Link Hover Color

quickview_color.label: Quickview Link Color
quickview_color.comment: This is for the quickview icon on the category page list mode.

quickview_hover_color.label: Quickview Link Hover Color
quickview_hover_color.comment: This is for the quickview icon on the category page list mode.

font_size.label: Basic Font Size
font_size.comment: Size of the regular text. Font size of most of the other elements will be calculated relative to this value.

primary_font_family_group.label: Headings Font Family
primary_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

primary_font_family_custom.label: Custom
primary_font_family_custom.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

primary_font_family.label: Headings Font Family - Google Fonts
primary_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

primary_char_latin_ext.label: Character Set: Latin Extended
primary_char_latin_ext.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

custom_char_subset.label: Custom Character Subset
custom_char_subset.comment: Only selected fonts support character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts. eg: greek,greek-ext

footer_totop_hover_bgcolor.label: To Top Icon Hover Background Color

footer_totop_hover_color.label: To Top Icon Hover Font Color

page_custom_style.label: Custom Style
page_custom_style.comment:
Type in your custom styles for .page, e.g.:
background-position:center center;
background-repeat:no-repeat;

main_custom_style.label: Custom Style
main_custom_style.comment:
Type in your custom styles for .main-container, e.g.:
background-position:center center;
background-repeat:no-repeat;

out_of_box_color.label: Out of Box Background Color for Boxed version

out_of_box_image.label: Out of Box Background Image for Boxed version

show_notice.label: Show Site Notice
show_notice.comment: Show Notice custom block above of the header.

sticky_header_logo.label: Show Logo Image in Sticky Header

fixed_position_footer_enabled.label: Enable Fixed Position Footer
fixed_position_footer_enabled.comment: It will leave only Footer Bottom Area as Fixed Position on the ONLY HOMEPAGE.

alternative_image.label: Alternative Image
alternative_image.comment: Show thumbnail image when hover in product image area.

fullwidth_description.label: Show Category Description below the Header

move_actions.label: Move Actions
move_actions.comment: If yes, all of the action links that "Add to Cart" button, "Add to Compare" link and "Add to Wishlist" link will be moved into the product image area.

move_product_tab.label: Move Product Tabs at the Right of Product Image

show_brand.label: Show Brands in the right sidebar

from_category.label: Show Tabs by Settings from Parent Categories

show_link.label: Show Compare Page Link in TopLinks Area

customblock.label: Custom Block before Contacts Form
customblock.comment: Input the Static Block Id, this static block will be shown below of the google map and above of the contacts form.

custom_style.label: Custom Style 1
custom_style.comment:
Type in your custom styles , e.g.:
.page { padding: 0; margin: 0; }
.main { font-size: 14px; font-weight:400; }

custom_style_2.label: Custom Style 2
custom_style_2.comment: This field is useful with multi store. So you can add your global custom styles into this field.

import_blocks.label: Static Blocks
import_blocks.comment: Click this button to create all static blocks provided with porto theme.

overwrite_blocks.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
overwrite_blocks.comment: If the identifiers of the static blocks are already exist, you can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import Static Blocks" button.

import_pages.label: CMS Pages
import_pages.comment: Click this button to create all CMS pages provided with porto theme.

overwrite_pages.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
overwrite_pages.comment: If the identifiers of the cms pages are already exist, you can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import CMS Pages" button.

import_demo2.label: Demo 2
import_demo2.comment: This demo version updated with new layout, if you want to use old version, please do not import this new version.

import_demo3.label: Demo 3
import_demo3.comment: This demo version updated with new layout, if you want to use old version, please do not import this new version.
